attributes.action: investigate Ebay in relation to the new illegal seller feedback practice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of last week Ebay have stopped Sellers making the choice whether to leave negative or neutral feedback for buyers - leaving normal people at the mercy of dishonest buyers.

Basically if someone buys from a seller they can demand anything and threaten to leave negative feedback - ruining the sellers rating and helping to ruin businesses.

Ebay say it protects buyers - yet there is no protection for sellers.

This policy must be reversed

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
